name: Mr Reborn
description:
Mr Reborn

You are a hitman but if you die you become a ghost and can swap bodies with enemies. The game is made in 6 days for the  "Brackeys Game Jam 2023.1"

Note - Use full screen

Music made with: Ecrett Music

And the two avatars in the menu is made with: https://kenney.itch.io/avatar-mixer
